#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n;
        cin>>n;
        long long int ar[n],i;
        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            cin>>ar[i];
        }
        long long int large =ar[0];
        long long int small = ar[0];
        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            if(ar[i]>large)
            large=ar[i];
            if(ar[i]<small)
            small=ar[i];
        }
        cout<<large-small<<"\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
